prompt: Atlantis rose and merged with Cornwall. Describe this new nation.
response: Atlantis rose and merged with Cornwall, resulting in a new nation known as the Kingdom of Cornwall. This merged kingdom would have been the largest and most populous of the three kingdoms, stretching from the south-western tip of the Continent to the northern boundary of the United Kingdom, and from the northwestern tip of the Continent to the south-eastern tip of the United Kingdom. It would have encompassed a population of approximately 7 million people, with a total area of about 17, 000 square miles, and a population density of about 1. 3 inhabitants per square mile.
